General.Name: Titanium Oyj
General.Description: Titanium Oyj provides in the fund, investment, and asset management services in Finland. The company offers investment solutions in the areas of investment funds, property management, and insurance representation, as well as provides investment advice and securities brokerage services. It serves private, institutional, and corporate customers. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.
